channel.title: Forms on PrestaShop Developer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Forms on PrestaShop Developer Documentation

item.title: Alter Configuration Back Office forms
item.description: Alter configuration forms on modern pagesOne of the most common tasks for the PrestaShop developers is to alter the data and make it manageable for customers. This system only works with pages from the “Configure” section of your back office. If you want to customize an entity form, you’re looking for Grid and Identifiable Objects. Learn how to achieve this with the Grid and identifiable object form hooks usage example.
